attributes.action: we want you to ban wet markets
attributes.additional_details: we saw loads of wet market pictures and the conditions are horrible we  saw the animals and straight away knew that they do not deserve it just imagine you were an innocent animal trapped in a cage then slaughtered.
attributes.background: we want to do this because we love animals and just thinking about those poor animals makes us feel sad because we can just picture our pets in that horrible,dirty place

rejection.details:
Wet markets are all markets selling fresh meat, fish and other perishable goods. If you want the sale of such goods to end you might like to sign the following petitions:

Ban Slaughter and Breeding of Innocent Animals for food: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556039

Take action to end factory farming and reduce meat and dairy consumption: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330298
